collectible.title: Saki's T-Shirt
collectible.subtitle: An authentic idol keepsake worn by Franchouchou Number Two.
collectible.text:
Saki gave this to you after the concert. It's signed... with a phone number to boot!
Too bad the handwriting's so shitty you can't make it out.
collectible.unlock: Win a game versus Saki Nikaidou.

collectible.title: Dried Squid
collectible.subtitle: A zombie's favorite snack!
collectible.text: The treat of choice for zombies. It's said it's because it replicates the taste and texture of human flesh. Hey, wait a second! How'd she get in here!?
collectible.unlock: Win against Saki Nikaidou and another Franchouchou gal.
